definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to guide/to give directions/to direct/to coach/guidance/tuition/CL:個|个[ge4]
to conduct/to command/to direct/conductor (of an orchestra)/CL:個|个[ge4]
stock market index/share price index/abbr. for 股票指數|股票指数[gu3 piao4 zhi3 shu4]
to appoint/to assign/to indicate clearly and with certainty/designated
to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
to point towards/aimed at/facing/the direction indicated

sentences.english: Confucius about drinking water and a single scoop sparse Louxiang refers only to this aspect.
sentences.chinese: 孔子談疏食飲水和單瓢陋巷指的都只是此一面。

sentences.english: Extendibility is the ease of adapting software products to changes of specification.
sentences.chinese: 擴充性是指易於修改軟件以適應規格變化。

sentences.english: Redundancy is a linguistic phenomenon that the linguistic form is more than its linguistic content.
sentences.chinese: 羨餘現象，是指語言的表達形式多於表達內容。

sentences.english: You mean my favorite movie of all time?
sentences.chinese: 你是指有史以來電影我最喜歡哪一部嗎？

sentences.english: Quality is the consumer product or service satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 質量是指消費者對產品或服務滿意的程度。

sentences.english: Sets the pix el at the specified point to the closest approximation of the specified color.
sentences.chinese: 設置指定點像素爲最接近指定色的近似值。

sentences.english: Tip sag refers to when the tip of one's pizza slice droops down.
sentences.chinese: 披薩尖兒指一片披薩頂端餡料掉下的地方。

sentences.english: Dharma refers to one's place in the natural order of events.
sentences.chinese: 德性指的是，在事件的自然秩序中一個人的位置。

sentences.english: Thanks for viewing and the support. Did you mean skiing or Vietnamese pho?
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你的觀看與支持，你是指滑雪還是越南河粉？

sentences.english: Do you mean the Performing Arts Theater on Marshall Street?
sentences.chinese: 你是指在馬歇爾街的表演藝術劇院嗎？

sentences.english: HIV stands for human immunodeficiency virus.
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病病毒是指人體免疫缺損病毒。

sentences.english: "Other patriots" refers primarily to the enlightened gentry.
sentences.chinese: 所說的“其他愛國人士”，則主要地是指的開明紳士。

sentences.english: The rule of absolution for taking pities on destitution was related to relieving the disaster and reducing farm taxes and excising taxes.
sentences.chinese: 蠲恤則例是指救災扶荒與蠲減稅賦方面的法規或準則。

sentences.english: The maintaining power means that the property of an object has an unshakeable internal power.
sentences.chinese: 定力是指事物性質具有不可動搖的內力。

sentences.english: Net worth is defined as assets minus liabilities.
sentences.chinese: 這裏淨資產是指資產減去債務。

sentences.english: I mean, we are 500 points on the Dow- Jones industrial average .
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是，我們在討論道瓊斯工業均指的500點。

definition: to make a general reference/to be used in a general sense
namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
idea/opinion/meaning/wish/desire/interest/fun/token of appreciation, affection etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to give as a small token/to do sth as a gesture of goodwill etc
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
meaning (implicit in a phrase)/implied meaning/hidden meaning/hint/connotation
